name: market for auxiliary heating unit, electric, 5kW | auxiliary heating unit, electric, 5kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7984/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'auxiliary heating unit, electric, 5kW', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the product of an electric auxiliary heating unit with a capacity of 5 kW,  that is used as auxiliary heating for hot water in solar collector systems.  Its production includes materials and energy consumption but excluding and factory infrastructure.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
